About Golden China Golden China is a Fast Food restaurant located at 2046 E Ridgeway Ave in Waterloo, IA . Golden China has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, Chinese Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Golden China
All Reviews for Golden China
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
I have gone at lunch a couple of times. We got back to work on time. The service isn't too bad. The food isn't too good. The chips and dip are great though. The music was comparable to a German Speed Rock Band (described by a co-worker).
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"

Golden China Tips Cheap lunch, great food!
Sarah M. If you get an order to go, DON'T call it in. They cook the food way too fast! Order at the counter and you'll wait about 5 minutes. Seriously
Jamie G. Crab Ragoons are the best! :)
Jessica P. Best place for lunch. Super cheap&super good.
